en: I was informed of his failure in the examination.
zh: 我得知他考试没通过。

en: I take it for granted that he will succeed in the examination.
zh: 我理所当然地认为他会通过考试。

en: It is certain that he passed the examination.
zh: 他肯定通过了考试。

en: I'm glad that he passed the exam.
zh: 我很高兴他通过了考试。

en: I was pleased to hear that he had succeeded in the examination.
zh: 我很高兴听到他考试成功了。

en: That he passed the exam is surprising to us.
zh: 他通过了考试，这让我们很惊讶。

en: It is no wonder that he passed the examination.
zh: 他通过考试一点也不奇怪。

en: It is true that he got full marks on the test.
zh: 他考试得了满分是真的。

en: I don't know whether he will agree to our plan or not.
zh: 我不知道他是否会同意我们的计划。

en: It's impossible that he forgot our meeting.
zh: 他不可能忘记我们的会面。

en: We took it for granted that he would join us.
zh: 我们理所当然地认为他会加入我们。

en: I expected that he would visit me.
zh: 我期望他会来看我。

en: I began to understand the reason why he hated me.
zh: 我开始明白他为什么讨厌我了。

en: He came to my rescue.
zh: 他来救我了。

en: It has dawned upon me that he does not like me.
zh: 我突然意识到他不喜欢我。

en: I know he is watching me.
zh: 我知道他在监视我。

en: He has made me what I am.
zh: 他成就了今天的我。

en: I saw him looking at me.
zh: 我看到他在看着我。

en: I was surprised because he lifted me up with ease.
zh: 我很惊讶，因为他毫不费力地举起了我。

en: He chose to have me stay.
zh: 他选择让我留下。

en: I felt like hitting him when he tried to cheat me.
zh: 当他试图欺骗我时，我很想打他。

en: It is not likely that he did it on purpose to deceive me.
zh: 他故意欺骗我的可能性不大。

en: It never occurred to me that he loved me.
zh: 我从来没有想到他爱我。

en: He went into the water before me.
zh: 他比我先下水了。

en: I don't know whether he's younger or older than I am.
zh: 我不知道他比我年轻还是年长。

en: I think it was a mistake that he didn't take my advice.
zh: 我认为他不听我的建议是个错误。

en: If he had taken my advice, he would now be rich.
zh: 如果他听了我的建议，现在应该已经很富有了。

en: It is necessary that he follow my advice.
zh: 他有必要听从我的建议。

en: He needs to follow my advice.
zh: 他需要听从我的建议。

en: He went in place of me.
zh: 他代替我去了。

en: I think it doubtful whether he understood my explanation.
zh: 我怀疑他是否理解了我的解释。

en: He's charging me roughly four times as much as he charged when he started cutting my lawn.
zh: 他现在收我的费用大约是他刚开始给我剪草坪时的四倍。

en: What he finds in my face I can't guess.
zh: 他在我的脸上看到了什么，我猜不出来。

en: He has my fate in his hands.
zh: 他掌握着我的命运。

en: Either he or I have to attend the convention.
zh: 要么他要么我必须参加会议。

en: Whether he agrees to my opinion or not, I will do the work.
zh: 无论他是否同意我的意见，我都会完成这项工作。

en: Either he or I am to attend the meeting.
zh: 要么他要么我要参加会议。

en: Either he is to blame, or I am.
zh: 要么他该受责备，要么我该受责备。

en: He is wrong or I am.
zh: 要么他错了，要么我错了。

en: Either he is wrong or I am.
zh: 要么他错了，要么我错了。

en: He is the chief of my department.
zh: 他是我的部门主管。

en: What he told me proved true.
zh: 他告诉我的事情证明是真的。

en: I hope he will see me and listen to my future plans.
zh: 我希望他能见我并听取我未来的计划。

en: I wonder what he promised to do for me.
zh: 我想知道他答应为我做什么。

en: It never occurred to me that he might insist on treating me to dinner.
zh: 我从来没有想到他会坚持请我吃饭。

en: It is surprising that he should have said such things of me.
zh: 他竟然会说出这样评价我的话，真是令人惊讶。

en: If only he would marry me!
zh: 要是他能娶我就好了！

en: That he refused our proposal was big surprise to us.
zh: 他拒绝了我们的提议，这让我们大吃一惊。

en: I wish he were on our team.
zh: 我希望他在我们的团队里。

en: I don't know whether he'll join us or not.
zh: 我不知道他是否会加入我们。

en: Three years have passed since he died.
zh: 他去世已经三年了。

en: With his death, the oldest family in this village died out.
zh: 随着他的去世，这个村子里最古老的家族绝迹了。

en: Ten years have passed since he died.
zh: 他去世已经十年了。

en: He's been dead ten years.
zh: 他已经去世十年了。

en: It's been ten years since he died.
zh: 他去世已经十年了。

en: She still hated him, even after he died.
zh: 即使在他去世后，她仍然恨他。

en: It has been ten years since he died.
zh: 他去世已经十年了。

en: He has been dead for three years.
zh: 他已经去世三年了。

en: The evening he died was stormy.
zh: 他去世的那个晚上风雨交加。

en: It was yesterday that he died.
zh: 他昨天去世的。

en: It is a great pity he was given up for lost.
zh: 他被放弃，真是太可惜了。

en: I was surprised at the news of his death.
zh: 听到他去世的消息，我很惊讶。

en: The news that he died was a shock to me.
zh: 他去世的消息让我很震惊。

en: The news of his death spread abroad.
zh: 他去世的消息传开了。

en: The news of his death spread.
zh: 他去世的消息传开了。

en: The news of his death spread around.
zh: 他去世的消息传开了。

en: What will become of the children after his death?
zh: 他去世后，孩子们会怎么样？

en: The estate went to his daughter when he died.
zh: 他去世后，遗产归了他的女儿。

en: He is actually not the manager.
zh: 他实际上不是经理。

en: It is not surprising that he was elected mayor.
zh: 他当选市长并不奇怪。

en: I've known him ever since he was a child.
zh: 我从小就认识他。

en: Let's wait here until he turns up.
zh: 我们在这里等到他出现吧。

en: He is certain to turn up.
zh: 他肯定会出现的。

en: I thought it strange that he didn't turn up.
zh: 他没出现，我觉得很奇怪。

en: I thought it was strange that he didn't turn up.
zh: 他没出现，我觉得很奇怪。

en: His constant complaints aroused my rage.
zh: 他不停的抱怨激怒了我。

en: There must be something wrong with the pen he is using.
zh: 他用的笔一定有问题。

en: I am certain that he will quit his job.
zh: 我确信他会辞职。

en: He has every reason to quit his job.
zh: 他完全有理由辞职。

en: I don't care whether he agrees or not.
zh: 我不在乎他是否同意。

en: It is uncertain whether he will agree or not.
zh: 他不一定会同意。

en: It makes no difference whether he agrees or not.
zh: 他是否同意都无所谓。

en: It doesn't matter whether he agrees or not.
zh: 他是否同意都不要紧。

en: He fell in with a strange man when he was taking a walk.
zh: 他散步时偶然遇到一个奇怪的男人。

en: Whether he agrees or not, we won't change our plans.
zh: 不管他是否同意，我们都不会改变计划。

en: I read in the newspaper that he had been murdered.
zh: 我在报纸上看到他被谋杀了。

en: It is doubtless that he was murdered.
zh: 毫无疑问他被谋杀了。

en: There is no doubt that he was murdered.
zh: 毫无疑问他被谋杀了。

en: What he told me yesterday is a white lie.
zh: 他昨天告诉我的事是一个善意的谎言。

en: What he said yesterday is not true.
zh: 他昨天说的话不是真的。

en: What he said yesterday is not consistent with what he had said last week.
zh: 他昨天说的话与他上周说的话不一致。

en: He came to see you yesterday.
zh: 他昨天来看你了。

en: He came yesterday to see you.
zh: 他昨天来看你。

en: The fish he caught yesterday is still alive.
zh: 他昨天抓的鱼还活着。

en: He cannot have been there yesterday.
zh: 他昨天不可能在那里。

en: His paper plane was fragile.
zh: 他的纸飞机很脆弱。

en: I must make sure whether he is at home or not.
zh: 我必须确定他是否在家。

en: There is no room to doubt that he is a gifted artist.
zh: 毫无疑问他是一位有天赋的艺术家。

en: There is no doubt about his ability.
zh: 他的能力毋庸置疑。

en: His boast that he is the best pitcher is true.
zh: 他自夸是最好的投手，这是真的。

en: He was the first to come.
zh: 他是第一个来的。

en: He came first.
zh: 他第一个来的。

en: He was the first person to arrive.
zh: 他是第一个到达的人。

en: He was the first to arrive.
zh: 他是第一个到达的。

en: What he needs most is a good job.
zh: 他最需要的是一份好工作。

en: His reelection seems sure.
zh: 他似乎肯定会再次当选。

en: The dinner he ate this evening was inferior in quality to that dinner.
zh: 他今天晚上吃的晚餐质量不如那顿晚餐。

en: It is no laughing matter that he couldn't graduate from university this year.
zh: 他今年没能从大学毕业可不是一件好笑的事。

en: Do you know the reason why he cut class today?
zh: 你知道他今天为什么逃课吗？

en: Do you know why he skipped class today?
zh: 你知道他今天为什么旷课吗？

en: I don't know the reason he is absent today.
zh: 我不知道他今天缺席的原因。

en: What he is today he owes to his father.
zh: 他今天所拥有的一切都归功于他的父亲。

en: Sport has made him what he is.
zh: 运动造就了他今天的成就。

en: You should read such a good book as he is reading now.
zh: 你应该读读像他现在正在读的这么好的书。

en: I don't know if he will visit us next Sunday.
zh: 我不知道下周日他是否会来看我们。

en: I am uncertain when he will come next.
zh: 我不确定他下次什么时候来。

en: We were surprised when we saw him in the office this morning.
zh: 今天早上我们在办公室看到他时感到很惊讶。

en: Where he will live doesn't interest us.
zh: 他将住在哪里我们不感兴趣。

en: It is certain that he is in Hawaii now.
zh: 他现在肯定在夏威夷。

en: We are worried about where he is now.
zh: 我们担心他现在在哪里。

en: Make certain where he is now.
zh: 确定他现在在哪里。

en: I know nothing as to where he is now.
zh: 我不知道他现在在哪里。

en: I wish he were here now.
zh: 我希望他现在在这里。

en: I copied in my notebook whatever he wrote on the blackboard.
zh: 他写在黑板上的所有东西我都抄在了笔记本上。

en: He hasn't been heard from since he left the country.
zh: 自从他离开这个国家后，就再也没有他的消息了。

en: I would like to have seen him before he left the country.
zh: 我真希望在他出国前见他一面。

en: It is doubtful whether he will pass.
zh: 他是否能通过考试还很难说。

en: His success delighted his parents.
zh: 他的成功让他的父母非常高兴。

en: I don't care whether he leaves or stays.
zh: 他走不走我都无所谓。

en: It is definite that he will go.
zh: 他肯定会去的。

en: It is advisable for him to go.
zh: 他最好去。

en: The dog followed him wherever he went.
zh: 那条狗无论他去哪里都跟着他。

en: It is Egypt that he wants to visit.
zh: 他想去的地方是埃及。

en: I know quite clearly what he thinks.
zh: 我非常清楚他在想什么。

en: I understand him to be happy.
zh: 据我所知，他很幸福。

en: I like him.
zh: 我喜欢他。

en: It is evident that he has made a mistake.
zh: 很明显，他犯了一个错误。

en: I can't understand what he is trying to say.
zh: 我不明白他想说什么。

en: What he says sounds very sensible to me.
zh: 我觉得他说的很有道理。

en: What he is saying doesn't make sense.
zh: 他说的毫无意义。

en: I got the gist of what he was saying.
zh: 我理解了他所说的要点。

en: What he said was to the contrary.
zh: 他说的恰恰相反。

en: Everything he said was right.
zh: 他说的每句话都是对的。

en: Only a few understood what he said.
zh: 只有少数人理解他所说的话。

en: I remember what he said.
zh: 我记得他说的话。

en: Do you believe what he said?
zh: 你相信他说的话吗？

en: Do tell me what he said.
zh: 告诉我他说了什么。

en: What he said turned out to be true.
zh: 他说的话后来证明是真的。

en: What he has said is true of them.
zh: 他所说的话对他们来说是真实的。

en: What he said is not true.
zh: 他说的不是真的。

en: What he said then shocked me.
zh: 他当时说的话让我震惊了。

en: What he said was by no means true.
zh: 他说的绝不是真的。

en: What he said is, in a sense, true.
zh: 他说的，在某种意义上，是真的。

en: Some of the things he said got under my skin.
zh: 他说的有些话让我很不舒服。

en: Don't take any notice of what he said.
zh: 别理会他说的任何话。

en: I cannot understand what he is driving at.
zh: 我不明白他到底想说什么。

en: He says firefighting is a feast or famine job.
zh: 他说消防员的工作要么很忙，要么很闲。

en: Few students could understand what he said.
zh: 很少有学生能听懂他说的。

en: Admitting what he says, I still think that he is in the wrong.
zh: 即使承认他说的，我仍然认为他是错的。

en: What he says is false.
zh: 他说的是假的。

en: Whatever he says is true.
zh: 无论他说什么都是真的。

en: All that he says is true.
zh: 他说的都是真的。

en: I think it's true that he wasn't at the scene.
zh: 我认为他当时不在现场是真的。

en: I have no idea where he is at present.
zh: 我不知道他现在在哪里。

en: There was an awkward silence when he appeared.
zh: 他出现时，气氛变得很尴尬。

en: His appearance animated the party.
zh: 他的出现使聚会活跃起来。

en: When he appeared, the party livened up.
zh: 他出现时，聚会的气氛活跃了起来。

en: We were talking about him when he appeared.
zh: 他出现的时候，我们正在谈论他。

en: When he turned up, we had been waiting for two hours.
zh: 他出现的时候，我们已经等了两个小时了。

en: When he went out the front door, the bus was just coming around the corner.
zh: 他走出前门的时候，公共汽车正好转过街角。

en: I am no more intelligent than he.
zh: 我并不比他聪明。

en: It is not clear whether he is wise or not.
zh: 他不聪明还是不聪明，这一点还不清楚。

en: I'm sure that he is clever.
zh: 我确信他很聪明。

en: He was seen to enter the building.
zh: 有人看见他进入了大楼。

en: The box he found was empty.
zh: 他找到的盒子是空的。

en: It was a miracle that he recovered.
zh: 他能康复简直是个奇迹。

en: His good health is attributed to getting plenty of sleep.
zh: 他的身体健康归功于充足的睡眠。

en: It's been ten years since they were married.
zh: 他们结婚已经十年了。

en: How did you know that he is married?
zh: 你怎么知道他结婚了？

en: The woman whom he married is very beautiful.
zh: 他娶的那个女人非常漂亮。

en: The woman he married is very beautiful.
zh: 他娶的那个女人非常漂亮。

en: It is not you but her that he wants to marry.
zh: 他想娶的不是你，而是她。

en: It's just possible that he'll eventually recover the use of his legs.
zh: 他最终有可能恢复腿的功能。

en: I am convinced that he is innocent.
zh: 我确信他是无辜的。

en: I am impatient with his inability to make decisions.
zh: 我对他优柔寡断感到不耐烦。

en: I can't account for his absence.
zh: 我无法解释他的缺席。

en: It came out that what he had told the police was not true.
zh: 结果表明，他告诉警察的不是真的。

en: Don't you know he is enraged at your insult?
zh: 难道你不知道他因为你的侮辱而勃然大怒吗？

en: The reason he refused your offer is obvious.
zh: 他拒绝你的提议的原因很明显。

en: No wonder he refused your offer.
zh: 难怪他拒绝了你的提议。

en: I bet that he'll accept your proposal.
zh: 我敢打赌他会接受你的提议。

en: It is certain that he will agree to your plan.
zh: 他肯定会同意你的计划。

en: Don't count on him to lend you any money.
zh: 别指望他借钱给你。

en: He cannot have told you a wrong number.
zh: 他不可能告诉过你一个错误的号码。

en: Were he to see you, he would be surprised.
zh: 如果他看到你，他会很惊讶。

en: Whatever he asks you, you mustn't answer.
zh: 无论他问你什么，你都不能回答。

en: The police suspect that he robbed the bank.
zh: 警方怀疑他抢劫了银行。

en: It is clear that he is rich.
zh: 很明显他很富有。

en: I never counted on his being rich.
zh: 我从没指望过他会富有。

en: Because he is rich, it doesn't follow that he is happy.
zh: 因为他富有，并不意味着他快乐。

en: Just because he's rich, doesn't mean he's happy.
zh: 仅仅因为他有钱，并不意味着他快乐。

en: It's clear that he stole money from the safe.
zh: 很明显，他从保险箱里偷了钱。

en: I caught him stealing the money.
zh: 我抓到他偷钱了。

en: Some new books were added to the library at his expense.
zh: 一些新书由他出资添置到了图书馆。

en: We congratulated him on winning a gold medal.
zh: 我们祝贺他赢得金牌。

en: We cried banzai at the news that he won the gold medal.
zh: 听到他赢得金牌的消息，我们欢呼万岁。

en: He moved into my neighborhood.
zh: 他搬到我家附近了。

en: I have a feeling that he may blow in sometime soon.
zh: 我感觉他可能很快会来拜访。

en: He was right to give up smoking.
zh: 他戒烟是对的。

en: To his surprise, the thief turned out to be his own son.
zh: 令他惊讶的是，小偷竟然是他自己的儿子。

en: To his amazement, the door opened all by itself.
zh: 令他惊讶的是，门竟然自己打开了。

en: To his surprise, the train made a quick stop.
zh: 令他惊讶的是，火车突然停了一下。

en: His threat got me to start studying seriously.
zh: 他的威胁让我开始认真学习。

en: When he shouted, the veins in his neck stood out clearly.
zh: 他喊叫时，脖子上的血管清晰地凸了出来。

en: I stayed there until he had left.
zh: 我一直待在那里直到他离开。

en: After he left, she started feeling uneasy.
zh: 他离开后，她开始感到不安。

en: I was pleased with the rapidity with which he mastered Japanese.
zh: 他掌握日语的速度之快让我很高兴。

en: Now that he is absent, I will have to work in his place.
zh: 既然他不在，我就得代替他工作。

en: The reason he was absent was that he had a severe headache.
zh: 他缺席的原因是他得了严重的头痛。

en: His absence was due to illness.
zh: 他缺席是因为生病。

en: It is best that he should do his duty.
zh: 他最好尽自己的职责。

en: When he came to, he was lying in the park.
zh: 当他醒来时，他正躺在公园里。

en: I saw at once that he was ill at ease.
zh: 我立刻看出他感到不自在。

en: Upon returning home, he found a letter in the mailbox.
zh: 回到家后，他发现邮箱里有一封信。

en: I suggested to her that we go to the movies after he came home.
zh: 我向她建议，等他回家后我们去看电影。

en: I was just going to write a letter when he came home.
zh: 我正要写信，他就回家了。

en: The sun had already set when he got home.
zh: 他到家的时候，太阳已经下山了。

en: It was because he was sick that he decided to return home.
zh: 他决定回家是因为他生病了。

en: It was because he was ill that he decided to return home.
zh: 他决定回家是因为他生病了。

en: When he was leaving, he told me that he would come again by the 25th.
zh: 他走的时候告诉我，他25号之前会再来。

en: It will have stopped raining by the time he comes back.
zh: 等他回来的时候，雨应该已经停了。

en: Let's leave as soon as he gets back.
zh: 他一回来我们就走吧。

en: He came back, and it rained soon.
zh: 他回来了，很快就下雨了。

en: It rained as soon as he got home.
zh: 他一到家就下雨了。

en: I'll wait here till he comes back.
zh: 我会在那儿等他回来。

en: Let's leave things as they are until he comes back.
zh: 在他回来之前，我们先保持现状吧。

en: Let's start after he comes home.
zh: 等他回家后我们再开始吧。

en: As soon as he comes back, let me know.

en: Everybody thought it strange that he lived alone.

en: Everybody thought it was strange that he lived alone.
zh: 大家都觉得他一个人住很奇怪。

en: It is doubtful whether he did his homework by himself.
zh: 他是否自己完成作业，令人怀疑。

en: He cannot have completed the work by himself.

en: He has good reason to get very angry.

en: He may well get very angry.

en: She insisted that he play the piano.

en: He played the piano and she sang.

en: Keep silent while he is playing the piano.

en: If you heard him playing the piano, you would never think he is an eight-year-old boy.
zh: 如果你听到他弹钢琴，你绝对不会认为他是一个八岁的男孩。

en: They are investigating the mystery of the universe thoroughly.

en: It is two years since he left for Hawaii.
zh: 他离开去夏威夷已经两年了。

en: It's been two years since he went Hawaii.

en: He wouldn't be caught dead playing pachinko.

en: When he arrived at the bus stop, the bus was already out of sight.

en: As soon as he got on the bus, it began to move.

en: When he came to Tokyo for the first time, this college had not been opened yet.

en: He is anything but a fool.

en: The meeting was going off without a hitch until he threw a wet blanket on it by making silly remarks.
zh: 会议进行得很顺利，直到他发表愚蠢的言论泼了冷水。

en: I had been reading a letter when he came in.

en: He took charge of the arrangements for the party.

en: I can hardly make out what he says.

en: Don't lose your temper whatever he may say.

en: Do you know why he put off his departure?

en: It's obvious why his stomach hurts.

en: I can't make out why he isn't here yet.

en: I can't make out why he is so much troubled.

en: I can't figure out why he did it.

en: It is a mystery why he did not finish the poem.

en: I can't figure out why he said so.

en: He hit me, not her.

en: I can't figure him out.

en: I don't know what he is like.

en: We can know in advance what excuse he will make.

en: I don't know what plan he will try.

en: No matter how hard he may study, he cannot master English in a year or two.

en: It doesn't matter what excuse he gives me, I can't forgive him.

en: Isn't there any way to predict how he'll act?

en: It is interesting how he learned Japanese cooking.

en: How he escaped still puzzles us.

en: Tell me how he got it.

en: He told us such funny stories that we all laughed.

en: He was naturally very angry.

en: I know for certain that he is a man of great importance.

en: He looked so funny that I couldn't help laughing.

en: I wish he would make up his mind one way or other.

en: Nobody knows where he has gone.

en: There is no way of knowing where he's gone.

en: I have no idea where he has gone.

en: I don't know where he went.

en: Do you know where he went?

en: It is all the same to me where he goes.

en: I don't know where he comes from.

en: God knows where he fled.

en: Nobody knows where he has escaped to.

en: I have no idea where he lives.

en: I don't know where he lives.
zh: 我不知道他住在哪里。

en: Tell me exactly where he lives.

en: No one could tell where he was.

en: Do you know where he bought his camera?

en: I stepped aside for him to pass.

en: I have no idea how he escaped.

en: No one knows how he has amassed his enormous fortune.

en: It beats me how he got that money.

en: I cannot guess at all what is going on with him.

en: What do you think has become of him?

en: I don't know what has become of him.

en: No one can imagine what has become of him.

en: Tell me what has become of him.

en: Do you know why he has been absent from school?

en: Who knows what has become of him?

en: When he would not give them higher pay, they went on strike.

en: I cannot understand why he left so suddenly.
zh: 我不明白他为什么走得这么突然。

en: I can't understand why he left so suddenly.
zh: 我不明白他为什么走得这么突然。

en: Do you know what has become of him?

en: Nobody could tell what he meant by that.

en: I don't know if he locked the door.

en: Look at him raising his arm in triumph.

en: He came out of the room at last.

en: If and when he arrives I'll pay.

en: When he comes, I'll pay the money that I promised.

en: He is the very person I was talking of.

en: It was a sight to see him dance.

en: It is regrettable that he was not elected captain of the team.

en: It is impossible for him to give up smoking.

en: It is strange that he should say so.

en: He can't have solved it.

en: It is impossible for him to do it.

en: This is the hut in which he lived.

en: If he doesn't accept the job, someone else will.

en: He made up for the deficit.

en: He was wrong to go ahead with the plan.

en: He is in charge of the class.

en: He is the man who drew the picture.

en: He has made the company what it is today.

en: He made the company what it is today.
zh: 他使这家公司成为了今天的样子。

en: It is strange that he should not have attended the meeting.

en: He may well respect the artist.

en: He was heard singing the song.

zh: 他决定不买那栋房子，首先是因为它太贵了，其次是因为它离他的办公室太远了。

en: It is not rare for him to make such a mistake.

en: It will take some time before he understands it.

en: It is surprising that he should not know this.

en: It is strange that he should not tell me anything about it.

en: It was clear that he went there.

en: It was yesterday that he went there.

en: I think it necessary for him to go there.

en: I think it's necessary for him to go there.

en: I think he needs to go there.

en: It will be dark by the time he gets there.

en: His decision to stay there was a surprise to all of us.

en: He has his reasons for staying there.

en: I was surprised to see him there.

en: He may be there.

en: Small wonder that he thinks so.

en: He does so not because he hates you, but because he loves you.

en: It was impolite of him to do so.

en: He did it not for me but for himself.

en: It is funny for him to say so.

en: Seeing that he's not preparing at all, it seems that he's not planning to take the exam.
zh: 看他一点也不准备，看来他是不打算参加考试了。

en: It will be a long time before he has fully recovered.

en: There is no hope that he will come soon.

en: Please tell me which bus to take to go downtown.
zh: 请告诉我坐哪路公交车去市中心。

en: Prosperity depends on hard work.
zh: 繁荣取决于努力工作。

en: You must realize that prosperity does not last forever.
zh: 你必须意识到繁荣不会永远持续下去。

en: It's totally without precedent for the suspect's attorney to be the true culprit.
zh: 嫌疑犯的律师竟然是真正的罪犯，这完全是史无前例的。

en: The criminal came out of the house with arms raised.
zh: 罪犯举着双手从房子里走了出来。

en: The prisoner escaped under cover of night.
zh: 囚犯在夜幕的掩护下逃脱了。

en: The criminal was arrested and put into prison.
zh: 罪犯被逮捕并投入监狱。

en: The culprit is caught like a rat in a trap.
zh: 罪犯像瓮中之鳖一样被抓住了。

en: The criminal left footprints.
zh: 罪犯留下了脚印。

en: The criminal confessed to theft.
zh: 罪犯供认了盗窃罪行。

en: The criminal didn't let the hostages go.
zh: 罪犯没有释放人质。

en: The criminal begged the judge for mercy.
zh: 罪犯恳求法官的宽恕。

en: The criminal was sent into exile.
zh: 罪犯被流放了。

en: The criminal was arrested by the police.
zh: 罪犯被警察逮捕了。

en: The criminal robbed the landlord of a hundred thousand dollars and ran away.
zh: 罪犯抢了地主十万块钱，然后逃跑了。

en: The criminal is not Bob, but his twin brother.
zh: 罪犯不是鲍勃，而是他的双胞胎兄弟。

en: The criminal and his companions ran away while we took our eyes off.
zh: 罪犯和他的同伙在我们没注意的时候逃跑了。

en: The criminals have all been apprehended.
zh: 罪犯们都被抓住了。

en: The crime rate is rising steadily.
zh: 犯罪率正在稳步上升。

en: The crime rate is increasing in this country.
zh: 这个国家的犯罪率正在上升。

en: The crime investigators are looking into the murder case.
zh: 犯罪调查员正在调查这起谋杀案。

en: I was asked to cooperate with them for the criminal investigation.
zh: 他们要求我配合他们的刑事调查。

en: Criminals generally do not single out police officers.
zh: 罪犯通常不会专门针对警察。

en: The criminal got very tired from the fight with the two officers.
zh: 罪犯和两名警官打斗后非常疲惫。

en: Criminals are deprived of social rights.
zh: 罪犯被剥夺了社会权利。

en: Crimes sometimes result from ignorance of the law.
zh: 犯罪有时是由于对法律的无知造成的。

en: Crime does not pay.
zh: 犯罪不会有好下场。

en: Crime doesn't pay.
zh: 犯罪不会有好下场。

en: Crime has often been related to poverty.
zh: 犯罪通常与贫困有关。

en: Every crime calls for punishment.
zh: 每项犯罪都应受到惩罚。

en: It cannot be denied that crime is on the increase.
zh: 不可否认的是，犯罪正在增加。

en: Crime is on the increase.
zh: 犯罪正在增加。

en: The plank froze to the ground.
zh: 木板冻在地上了。

en: Boards are used to make floors.
zh: 木板被用来制作地板。

en: He hammered nails into the plank.
zh: 他把钉子钉进了木板里。

en: All the sails were taken down.
zh: 所有的帆都降下来了。

en: The sails fluttered in the wind.
zh: 帆在风中飘动。

en: The wind filled the sails.
zh: 风鼓满了帆。

en: The rebels have captured the broadcasting station.
zh: 叛军占领了广播站。

en: The rebel concealed his ambition to destroy the regime.
zh: 叛军隐藏了他摧毁政权的野心。

en: A revolt broke out.
zh: 爆发了一场叛乱。

en: The revolt was crushed.
zh: 叛乱被镇压了。

en: The members of the opposition party were enraged against the bill.
zh: 反对党的成员对这项法案感到愤怒。

en: The noes have it.
zh: 反对票占多数。

en: A rebellion was brewing.
zh: 一场叛乱正在酝酿之中。

en: I had no desire to say anything against you.
zh: 我不想说任何对你不利的话。

en: He couldn't help doing so in the face of opposition.
zh: 面对反对，他忍不住这样做。

en: All political dissidents were purged under the former regime.
zh: 所有政治异议人士在前政权下都被清洗了。

en: Opposition leaders say it's possible the Communists could end up in a small minority.
zh: 反对派领导人表示，共产党人最终可能只占少数。

en: The defiant manner is characteristic of teenagers.
zh: 这种挑衅的态度是青少年的特征。

en: Rebellion it always sells at a profit.
zh: 叛逆总是能带来利润。

en: The rebels took control of the capital.
zh: 叛军控制了首都。

en: The rebel was ultimately captured and confined to prison.
zh: 叛军最终被抓获并被监禁。

en: The rebels made a barricade across the road.
zh: 叛军在路上设置了路障。

en: The anti-nuclear energy movement is being led by a number of organizations.
zh: 反核能运动由许多组织领导。

en: You'll get brownie points if you respond quickly.
zh: 如果你快速回应，你会得到加分。

en: Half-forgotten music danced through his mind.
zh: 半遗忘的音乐在他的脑海中跳动。

en: Give me half of it.
zh: 给我一半。

en: I had a Caesarian section six months ago.
zh: 我六个月前做了剖腹产手术。

en: Six months ago I had an operation for the cataract in my right eye.
zh: 六个月前我做了右眼白内障手术。

en: You must come every six months for a check-up.
zh: 你必须每六个月来做一次检查。

en: Do you offer any half-day tours?
zh: 你们提供半日游吗？

en: I only ride a bicycle at odd times.
zh: 我只在单数时间骑自行车。

en: Show me short-sleeved ones, please.
zh: 请给我看看短袖的。

en: Half of the melons were eaten.
zh: 一半的瓜被吃了。

en: It rained like mad for about a half-hour.
zh: 下了大约半个小时的倾盆大雨。

en: He will be here in half an hour.
zh: 他半小时后会到这里。

en: The judge bound the spectators to keep quiet.
zh: 法官要求旁听者保持安静。

en: The judge sentenced him to one year's imprisonment.
zh: 法官判处他一年监禁。

en: The judge was exhausted from the nervous strain.
zh: 法官因精神紧张而疲惫不堪。

en: The judge laughed in spite of himself.
zh: 法官忍不住笑了出来。

en: The judge can't stop.
zh: 法官停不下来。

en: Judgement will be given tomorrow.
zh: 明天宣判。

en: The decision was in favor of the defendant.
zh: 判决结果对被告有利。

en: The judgement was against him.
zh: 判决对他不利。

en: The judgement went against the government.
zh: 判决对政府不利。

en: The pigeon has flown away.
zh: 鸽子飞走了。

en: Thank to a fundamental restructuring, our surplus has swelled threefold.
zh: 由于根本性的重组，我们的盈余增加了两倍。

en: Thanks to a fundamental restructuring, our surplus has swelled three-fold.
zh: 由于根本性的重组，我们的盈余增加了两倍。

en: Should I have my tooth extracted?
zh: 我应该拔牙吗？

en: Your tooth must be extracted.
zh: 你的牙必须拔掉。

en: Is there any other way besides extraction?
zh: 除了拔牙，还有其他办法吗？

en: A lot of my hair has fallen out.
zh: 我掉了很多头发。

en: The fine shall be paid in cash.
zh: 罚款应以现金支付。

en: She resolved not to pay the fine.
zh: 她决定不支付罚款。

en: Didn't it ever occur to them that they would be punished?
zh: 他们难道没想过他们会受到惩罚吗？

en: A girl came running, with her hair streaming in the wind.
zh: 一个女孩跑了过来，头发在风中飘散。
